item.title: NEW: Police in Berlin tallied a record 2,267 antisemitic crimes in 2025, a sharp increase from 1,825...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @TimesofIsrael

NEW: Police in Berlin tallied a record 2,267 antisemitic crimes in 2025, a sharp increase from 1,825 cases recorded in 2024 and 900 in 2023. Antisemitic offenses categorized as motivated by foreign ideology, which the report says mostly concern the conflict in the Middle East, rose to 1,484, up from 24 in 2022. Crimes motivated by religious ideology climbed to 348, compared to six in 2022. Read more on The Times of Israel. https://www.timesofisrael.com/liveblog_entry/berlin-said-to-see-record
